meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she teazeled her little brother by hiding his favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: She teazeled her friends by pretending to reveal a secret but then changing the topic.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten teazeled the dog by stealing its bone and running around the house.
meanings.sent4: The clever magician teazeled the audience with his disappearing act.
meanings.sent5: The playful puppy teazeled the squirrel by chasing it up the tree.

meanings.definition: Teazeled (adjective): having been processed with teasels
meanings.sent1: The fabric felt soft and teazeled after being brushed with teasels.
meanings.sent2: The teazeled cloth had a unique texture that caught the eye of many shoppers.
meanings.sent3: The teazeled sweater kept her warm on the chilly evening.
meanings.sent4: The teazeled wool had a luxurious feel against her skin.
meanings.sent5: The teazeled scarf added a touch of elegance to her outfit.

meanings.definition: Teazeled (noun): a teasel plant or its dried flower head
meanings.sent1: The teazeled plant stood tall in the field, swaying gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: She collected teazeled flower heads to use in her art project.
meanings.sent3: The teazeled stems added a rustic charm to the floral arrangement.
meanings.sent4: The teazeled bouquet brought a touch of nature indoors.
meanings.sent5: The teazeled plant's spiky flower heads were perfect for decoration.
